name: hashtag_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_data.
Tool description: Real-time Instagram data API. Get very useful and unique information directly from Instagram. 
  I'm on Telegram https://t.me/logicBuilder

API description: Fetches information about a specific TikTok hashtag using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

hashtag.description: The TikTok hashtag for which to retrieve information.
